briefTitle: Factors Correlated With Fatigue in Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Factors Correlated With Fatigue in Breast Cancer Patients Before, During and After Adjuvant Chemotherapy
conditions: Newly Diagnosed Breast Cancer, Surgery Programmed
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The Multidimensional Fatigue Inventory (MFI-20) questionnaire is used to assess patient's fatigue.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* aged 18 years and older
* newly diagnosed with stage I-IIIA breast adenocarcinoma
* have undergone surgery
* WHO performance status score equal or lower than 2
* able to provide informed consent
* speak French and able to complete self-report questionnaires

Exclusion Criteria:

* pregnancy
* bilateral breast cancer
* metastatic breast cancer
* patients who received neoadjuvant chemotherapy
* known psychiatric disease or dementia
* no previous history of cancer
